General.Name: Jiangsu Asia Pacific Light Alloy Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Asia-Pacific Light Alloy Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of aluminum products. It offers precision aluminum tubes, special profiles and high-precision bars, and other automotive and industrial aluminum extrusion materials. The company serves military-civilian integration, aerospace, rail transit, seawater desalination, offshore oil platforms, commercial air conditioners, communication equipment, household appliances, and other industrial fields. It has operations in Asia, Europe, North America, South America, Africa, and other regions. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Yatal Aluminium Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Asia-Pacific Light Alloy Technology Co., Ltd. in September 2007. Jiangsu Asia-Pacific Light Alloy Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Wuxi, China.

3.Name: Ms. Shen  Lin
3.Title: Sec. of the Board & Assistant to GM
